method.description: Play a sample, an internal polyphony id can be passed, or else it's assigned automatically. Returns a voice id which can be used to modify the voice parameters.

method.name: voice_set_pitch_scale
method.description: Change the pitch scale of a currently playing voice.

method.name: voice_set_volume_scale_db
method.description: Change the volume scale of a currently playing voice (using dB).

method.name: is_voice_active
method.description: Return true if a voice is still active (false if it stopped playing).

method.name: stop_voice
method.description: Stop a given voice.

method.name: stop_all
method.description: Stop all playing voices.

constants.constant: If the voice is invalid, this is returned.

class.name: Script
class.description: Base class for scripts. Any script that is loaded becomes one of these resources, which can then create instances.

method.name: can_instance
method.description: Return true if this script can be instance (ie not a library).

method.name: instance_has
method.description: Return true if a given object uses an instance of this script.

method.name: has_source_code
method.description: Return true if the script contains source code.

method.name: get_source_code
method.description: Return the script source code (if available).

method.name: set_source_code
method.description: Set the script source code.

method.name: reload
method.description: Reload the script. This will fail if there are existing instances.

class.name: ScrollBar
class.description: Scrollbars are a [Range] based [Control], that display a draggable area (the size of the page). Horizontal ([HScrollBar]) and Vertical ([VScrollBar]) versions are available.

class.name: SegmentShape2D
class.description: Segment Shape for 2D Collision Detection, consists of two points, 'a' and 'b'.

class.name: Separator
class.description: Separator is a [Control] used for sepataring other controls. It's purely a visual decoration. Horizontal ([HSeparator]) and Vertical ([VSeparator]) versions are available.

class.name: Shader
class.description: To be changed, ignore.

class.name: Shape2D
class.description: Base class for all 2D Shapes. All 2D shape types inherit from this.

method.name: set_custom_solver_bias
method.description: Use a custom solver bias. No need to change this unless you really know what you are doing.

method.name: get_custom_solver_bias
method.description: Return the custom solver bias. No need to change this unless you really know what you are doing.

class.name: Skeleton
class.brief_description: Skeleton for characters and animated objects.
class.description: Skeleton provides a hierachial interface for managing bones, including pose, rest and animation (see [Animation]). Skeleton will support rag doll dynamics in the future.

method.name: add_bone
method.description: Add a bone, with name "name". [method get_bone_count] will become the bone index.

method.name: find_bone
method.description: Return the bone index that matches "name" as its name.

method.name: get_bone_name
method.description: Return the name of the bone at index "index"

method.name: get_bone_parent
method.description: Return the bone index which is the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note that the parent bone returned will always be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_parent
method.description: Set the bone index "parent_idx" as the parent of the bone at "bone_idx". If -1, then bone has no parent. Note: "parent_idx" must be less than "bone_idx".

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Return the amount of bones in the skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_rest
method.description: Return the rest transform for a bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_rest
method.description: Set the rest transform for bone "bone_idx"

method.name: bind_child_node_to_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon.

method.name: unbind_child_node_from_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon.

method.name: get_bound_child_nodes_to_bone
method.description: Deprecated soon.

method.name: clear_bones
method.description: Clear all the bones in this skeleton.

method.name: get_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

method.name: set_bone_pose
method.description: Return the pose transform for bone "bone_idx".

class.name: Slider
class.description: Base class for GUI Sliders.

method.name: set_ticks
method.description: Set amount of ticks to display in slider.

method.name: get_ticks
method.description: Return amounts of ticks to display on slider.

method.name: get_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Return true if ticks are visible on borders.

method.name: set_ticks_on_borders
method.description: Set true if ticks are visible on borders.

class.name: SoundPlayer2D
class.brief_description: Base class for playing spatial 2D sound.
class.description: Base class for playing spatial 2D sound.

class.name: Spatial
class.description: Spatial is the base for every type of 3D [Node]. It contains a 3D [Transform] which can be set or get as local or global. If a Spatial [Node] has Spatial children, their transforms will be relative to the parent.

method.name: set_transform
method.description: Set the transform locally, relative to the parent spatial node.

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Return the local transform, relative to the bone parent.

method.name: set_global_transform
method.description: Set the transform globally, relative to worldspace.

method.name: get_global_transform
method.description: Return the gloal transform, relative to worldspace.

method.name: get_parent_spatial
method.description: Return the parent [Spatial], or an empty [Object] if no parent exists or parent is not of type [Spatial].

constants.constant: Spatial nodes receive this notifacation with their global transform changes. This means that either the current or a parent node changed its transform.

class.name: SpatialSound2DServer
class.description: Server for Spatial 2D Sound.

class.name: SpinBox
class.description: SpinBox is a numerical input text field. It allows entering integers and floats.

method.name: set_suffix
method.description: Set a specific suffix.

method.name: get_suffix
method.description: Return the specific suffix.

method.name: set_prefix
method.description: Set a prefix.

method.name: set_editable
method.description: Set whether the spinbox is editable.

method.name: is_editable
method.description: Return if the spinbox is editable.

class.name: SplitContainer
class.description: Container for splitting two controls vertically or horizontally, with a grabber that allows adjusting the split offset or ratio.

method.name: set_split_offset
method.description: Set the split offset.

method.name: get_split_offset
method.description: Return the split offset.

method.name: set_collapsed
method.description: Set if the split must be collapsed.

method.name: is_collapsed
method.description: Return if the split is collapsed.

class.name: SpotLight
class.brief_description: Spotlight [Light], such as a reflector spotlight or a latern.
class.description: A SpotLight light is a type of [Light] node that emits lights in a specific direction, in the shape of a cone. The light is attenuated through the distance and this attenuation can be configured by changing the energy, radius and attenuation parameters of [Light]. TODO: Image of a spotlight.

class.name: Sprite
class.description: General purpose Sprite node. This Sprite node can show any texture as a sprite. The texture can be used as a spritesheet for animation, or only a region from a bigger texture can referenced, like an atlas.

method.name: set_texture
method.description: Set the base texture for the sprite.

method.name: get_texture
method.description: Return the base texture for the sprite.

method.name: set_centered
method.description: Set whether the sprite should be centered on the origin.

method.name: is_centered
method.description: Return if the sprite is centered at the local origin.

method.name: set_offset
method.description: Set the sprite draw offset, useful for setting rotation pivots.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return sprite draw offst.

method.name: set_flip_h
method.description: Set true to flip the sprite horizontaly.

method.name: is_flipped_h
method.description: Return true if the sprite is flipped horizontally.

method.name: set_flip_v
method.description: Set true to flip the sprite vertically.

method.name: is_flipped_v
method.description: Return true if the sprite is flipped vertically.

method.name: set_region
method.description: Set the sprite as a sub-region of a bigger texture. Useful for texture-atlases.

method.name: is_region
method.description: Return if the sprite reads from a region.

method.name: set_region_rect
method.description: Set the region rect to read from.

method.name: get_region_rect
method.description: Return the region rect to read from.

method.name: set_frame
method.description: Set the texture frame for a sprite-sheet, works when vframes or hframes are greater than 1.

method.name: get_frame
method.description: Return the texture frame for a sprite-sheet, works when vframes or hframes are greater than 1.

method.name: set_vframes
method.description: Set the amount of vertical frames and converts the sprite into a sprite-sheet. This is useful for animation.

method.name: get_vframes
method.description: Return the amount of vertical frames. See [set_vframes].

method.name: set_hframes
method.description: Set the amount of horizontal frames and converts the sprite into a sprite-sheet. This is useful for animation.

method.name: get_hframes
method.description: Return the amount of horizontal frames. See [set_hframes].

method.name: set_modulate
method.description: Set color modulation for the sprite. All sprite pixels are multiplied by this color.

method.name: get_modulate
method.description: Return color modulation for the sprite. All sprite pixels are multiplied by this color.

class.name: SpriteFrames
class.description: Sprite frame library for [AnimatedSprite].

method.name: add_frame
method.description: Add a frame (texture).

method.name: get_frame_count
method.description: Return the amount of frames.

method.name: get_frame
method.description: Return a texture (frame).

method.name: remove_frame
method.description: Remove a frame

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear the frames.

class.name: StaticBody
class.description: StaticBody implements a static collision [Node], by utilizing a rigid body in the [PhysicsServer]. Static bodies are used for static collision. For more information on physics body nodes, see [PhysicsBody].

class.name: StaticBody2D
class.description: Static body for 2D Physics. A static body is a simple body that is not intended to move. They don't consume any CPU resources in contrast to a [RigidBody2D] so they are great for scenaro collision. A static body can also be animated by using simulated motion mode. This is useful for implementing functionalities such as moving platforms. When this mode is active the body can be animated and automatically computes linear and angular velocity to apply in that frame and to influence other bodies. Alternatively, a constant linear or angular velocity can be set for the static body, so even if it doesn't move, it affects other bodies as if it was moving (this is useful for simulating conveyor belts or conveyor wheels).

method.name: set_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Set a constant linear velocity for the body.

method.name: set_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Set a constant angular velocity for the body.

method.name: get_constant_linear_velocity
method.description: Return the constant linear velocity for the body.

method.name: get_constant_angular_velocity
method.description: Return the constant angular velocity for the body.

class.name: StreamPeer
class.brief_description: Abstraction and base class for stream-based protocols.
class.description: StreamPeer is an abstration and base class for stream-based protocols (such as TCP or Unix Sockets). It provides an API for sending and receiving data through streams as raw data or strings.

method.name: put_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, blocking if necesary until the data is done sending. This function returns an [Error] code.

method.name: put_partial_data
method.description: Send a chunk of data through the connection, if all the data could not be sent at once, only part of it will. This function returns two values, an [Error] code and an integer, describing how much data was actually sent.

method.name: get_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will block until the desired amount is received. This function returns two values, an [Error] code and a data array.

method.name: get_partial_data
method.description: Return a chunk data with the received bytes. The amount of bytes to be received can be requested in the "bytes" argument. If not enough bytes are available, the function will return how many were actually received. This function returns two values, an [Error] code, and a data array.

class.name: StreamPeerTCP
class.description: TCP Stream peer. This object can be used to connect to TCP servers, or also is returned by a tcp server.

class.name: StreamPlayer
class.brief_description: Base class for audio stream playback.
class.description: Base class for audio stream playback. Audio stream players inherit from it.

class.name: String
class.description: This is the built-in string class (and the one used by GDScript). It supports Unicode and provides all necesary means for string handling. Strings are reference counted and use a copy-on-write approach, so passing them around is cheap in resources.

method.name: basename
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the path to the file without the extension.

method.name: begins_with
method.description: Return true if the strings begins with the given string.

method.name: capitalize
method.description: Return the string in uppercase.

method.name: casecmp_to
method.description: Perform a case-sensitive comparison to antoher string, return -1 if less, 0 if equal and +1 if greater.

method.name: empty
method.description: Return true if the string is empty.

method.name: extension
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the extension.

method.name: find
method.description: Find the first occurence of a substring, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: find_last
method.description: Find the last occurence of a substring, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: findn
method.description: Find the first occurence of a substring but search as case-insensitive, return the starting position of the substring or -1 if not found. Optionally, the initial search index can be passed.

method.name: get_base_dir
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the base directory.

method.name: get_file
method.description: If the string is a path to a file, return the file and ignore the base directory.

method.name: hash
method.description: Hash the string and return a 32 bits integer.

method.name: hex_to_int
method.description: Convert a string containing an hexadecimal number into an int.

method.name: insert
method.description: Insert a substring at a given position.

method.name: is_abs_path
method.description: If the string is a path to a file or directory, return true if the path is absolute.

method.name: is_rel_path
method.description: If the string is a path to a file or directory, return true if the path is relative.

method.name: is_valid_float
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid float.

method.name: is_valid_html_color
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid color in HTML notation.

method.name: is_valid_integer
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid integer.

method.name: is_valid_ip_address
method.description: Check whether the string contains a valid IP address.

method.name: left
method.description: Return an amount of characters from the left of the string.

method.name: length
method.description: Return the length of the string in characters.

method.name: match
method.description: Do a simple expression matching, using ? and * wildcards.

method.name: matchn
method.description: Do a simple, case insensitive, expression matching, using ? and * wildcards.

method.name: nocasecmp_to
method.description: Perform a case-insensitive comparison to antoher string, return -1 if less, 0 if equal and +1 if greater.

method.name: ord_at
method.description: Return the character code at position "at".

method.name: replace
method.description: Replace occurrences of a substring for different ones inside the string.

method.name: replacen
method.description: Replace occurrences of a substring for different ones inside the string, but search case-insensitive.

method.name: rfind
method.description: Perform a search for a substring, but start from the end of the string instead of the begining.

method.name: rfindn
method.description: Perform a search for a substring, but start from the end of the string instead of the begining. Also search case-insensitive.

method.name: right
method.description: Return the right side of the string from a given position.

method.name: split
method.description: Split the string by a divisor string, return an array of the substrings. Example "One,Two,Three" will return ["One","Two","Three"] if split by ",".

method.name: split_floats
method.description: Split the string in floats by using a divisor string, return an array of the substrings. Example "1,2.5,3" will return [1,2.5,3] if split by ",".

method.name: strip_edges
method.description: Return a copy of the string stripped of any non-printable character at the begining and the end.

method.name: substr
method.description: Return part of the string from "from", with length "len".

method.name: to_float
method.description: Convert a string, containing a decimal number, into a float.

method.name: to_int
method.description: Convert a string, containing an integer number, into an int.

method.name: to_lower
method.description: Return the string converted to lowercase.

method.name: to_upper
method.description: Return the string converted to uppercase.

method.name: xml_escape
method.description: Perform XML escaping on the string.

method.name: xml_unescape
method.description: Perform XML un-escaping of the string.

class.name: StringArray
class.description: String Array. Array of strings. Can only contain strings. Optimized for memory usage, can't fragment the memory.

class.name: StyleBox
class.brief_description: Base class for drawing stylized boxes for the UI.
class.description: StyleBox is [Resource] that provides an abstract base class for drawing stylized boxes for the UI. StyleBoxes are used for drawing the styles of buttons, line edit backgrounds, tree backgrounds, etc. and also for testing a transparency mask for pointer signals. If mask test fails on a StyleBox assigned as mask to a control, clicks and motion signals will go through it to the one below.

method.name: test_mask
method.description: Test a position in a rectangle, return wether it pases the mask test.

method.name: set_default_margin
method.description: Set the default offset "offset" of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) for a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: get_default_margin
method.description: Return the default offset of the margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum) of a StyleBox, Controls that draw styleboxes with context inside need to know the margin, so the border of the stylebox is not occluded.

method.name: get_margin
method.description: Return the offset of margin "margin" (see MARGIN_* enum).

method.name: get_minimum_size
method.description: Return the minimum size that this stylebox can be shrunk to.

method.name: get_offset
method.description: Return the "offset" of a stylebox, this is a helper function, like writing Point2( style.get_margin(MARGIN_LEFT), style.get_margin(MARGIN_TOP) )

class.name: StyleBoxEmpty
class.description: Empty stylebox (really does not display anything).

class.name: StyleBoxFlat
class.description: Stylebox of a single color. Displays the stylebox of a single color, alternatively a border with light/dark colors can be assigned.

class.name: StyleBoxImageMask
class.brief_description: Image mask based StyleBox, for mask test.
class.description: This StyleBox is similar to [StyleBoxTexture], but only meant to be used for mask testing. It takes an image and applies stretch rules to determine if the poit clicked is masked or not.

method.name: set_image
method.description: Set the image used for mask testing. Pixels (converted to grey) that have a value, less than 0.5 will fail the test.

method.name: get_image
method.description: Return the image used for mask testing. (see [method set_imag]).

method.name: set_expand
method.description: Set the expand property (default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: get_expand
method.description: Return wether the expand property is set(default). When expanding, the image will use the same rules as [StyleBoxTexture] for expand. If not expanding, the image will always be tested at its original size.

method.name: set_expand_margin_size
method.description: Set an expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

method.name: get_expand_margin_size
method.description: Return the expand margin size (from enum MARGIN_*). Parts of the image below the size of the margin (and in the direction of the margin) will not expand.

class.name: StyleBoxTexture
class.description: Texture Based 3x3 scale style. This stylebox performs a 3x3 scaling of a texture, where only the center cell is fully stretched. This allows for the easy creation of bordered styles.

class.name: SurfaceTool
class.description: Helper tool to create geometry.

class.name: TCP_Server
class.description: TCP Server class. Listens to connections on a port and returns a [StreamPeerTCP] when got a connection.

method.name: listen
method.description: Listen on a port, alternatively give a white-list of accepted hosts.

method.name: is_connection_available
method.description: Return true if a connection is available for taking.

method.name: take_connection
method.description: If a connection is available, return a StreamPeerTCP with the connection/

method.name: stop
method.description: Stop listening.

class.name: TabContainer
class.description: Tabbed Container. Contains several children controls, but shows only one at the same time. Clicking on the top tabs allows to change the currently visible one. Children controls of this one automatically.

method.name: get_tab_count
method.description: Return the amount of tabs.

method.name: set_current_tab
method.description: Bring a tab (and the Control it represents) to the front, and hide the rest.

method.name: get_current_tab
method.description: Return the current tab that is being showed.

method.name: set_tab_align
method.description: Set tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum. Moves tabs to the left, right or center.

method.name: get_tab_align
method.description: Return tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum.

method.name: set_tabs_visible
method.description: Set whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

method.name: are_tabs_visible
method.description: Return whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Set a title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overriden.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Return the title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overriden.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Set an icon for a tab.

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the current tab changes.

class.name: Tabs
class.description: Simple tabs control, similar to [TabContainer] but is only in charge of drawing tabs, not interact with children.

class.name: TextEdit
class.description: TextEdit is meant for editing large, multiline text. It also has facilities for editing code, such as syntax highlighting support and multiple levels of undo/redo.

method.name: set_text
method.description: Set the entire text.

method.name: insert_text_at_cursor
method.description: Insert a given text at the cursor position.

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Return the amount of total lines in the text.

method.name: get_text
method.description: Return the whole text.

method.name: get_line
method.description: Return the text of a specific line.

method.name: cursor_set_column
method.description: Set the current column of the text editor.

method.name: cursor_set_line
method.description: Set the current line of the text editor.

method.name: cursor_get_column
method.description: Return the column the editing cursor is at.

method.name: cursor_get_line
method.description: Return the line the editing cursor is at.

method.name: set_readonly
method.description: Set the text editor as read-only. Text can be displayed but not edited.

method.name: set_wrap
method.description: Enable text wrapping when it goes beyond he edge of what is visible.

method.name: set_max_chars
method.description: Set the maximum amount of characters editable.

method.name: cut
method.description: Cut the current selection.

method.name: copy
method.description: Copy the current selection.

method.name: paste
method.description: Paste the current selection.

method.name: select_all
method.description: Select all the text.

method.name: select
method.description: Perform selection, from line/column to line/column.

method.name: is_selection_active
method.description: Return true if the selection is active.

method.name: get_selection_from_line
method.description: Return the selection begin line.

method.name: get_selection_from_column
method.description: Return the selection begin column.

method.name: get_selection_to_line
method.description: Return the selection end line.

method.name: get_selection_to_column
method.description: Return the selection end column.

method.name: get_selection_text
method.description: Return the text inside the selection.

method.name: search
method.description: Perform a search inside the text. Search flags can be specified in the SEARCH_* enum.

method.name: undo
method.description: Perform undo operation.

method.name: redo
method.description: Perform redo operation.

method.name: clear_undo_history
method.description: Clear the undo history.

method.name: set_syntax_coloring
method.description: Set to enable the syntax coloring.

method.name: is_syntax_coloring_enabled
method.description: Return true if the syntax coloring is enabled.

method.name: add_keyword_color
method.description: Add a keyword and its color.

method.name: add_color_region
method.description: Add color region (given the delimiters) and its colors.

method.name: set_symbol_color
method.description: Set the color for symbols.

method.name: set_custom_bg_color
method.description: Set a custom background color. A background color with alpha==0 disables this.

method.name: clear_colors
method.description: Clear all the syntax coloring information.

signal.name: text_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the text changes.

signal.name: cursor_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the cursor changes.

constants.constant: Match case when searching.
Match whole words when searching.
Search from end to begining.

class.name: Texture
class.description: A texture works by registering an image in the video hardware, which then can be used in 3D models or 2D [Sprite] or GUI [Control]s.

method.name: get_width
method.description: Return the texture width.

method.name: get_height
method.description: Return the texture height.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Return the texture size.

method.name: get_rid
method.description: Return the texture RID as used in the [VisualServer].

method.name: set_flags
method.description: Change the texture flags.

method.name: get_flags
method.description: Return the current texture flags.

method.name: draw
method.description: Draw the texture into a a [VisualServer] canvas item.

constants.constant: Generate mipmaps, to enable smooth zooming out of the texture.
Repeat (instead of clamp to edge).
Turn on magnifying filter, to enable smooth zooming in of the texture.
Texture is a video surface.
Default flags. Generate mipmaps, repeat, and filter are enabled.

class.name: TextureButton
class.brief_description: Button that can be themed with textures.
class.description: Button that can be themed with textures. This is like a regular [Button] but can be themed by assigning textures to it. This button is intended to be easy to theme, however a regular button can expand (that uses styleboxes) and still be better if the interface is expect to have internationalization of texts. Only the normal texture is required, the others are optional.

class.name: TextureFrame
class.brief_description: Control Frame that draws a texture.
class.description: Control frame that simply draws an assigned texture. It can stretch or not. It's a simple way to just show an image in a UI.

class.name: TextureProgress
class.description: [ProgressBar] implementation that is easier to theme (by just passing a few textures).

class.name: Theme
class.description: Theme for skinning controls. Controls can be skinned individually, but for complex applications it's more efficient to just create a global theme that defines everything. This theme can be applied to any [Control], and it and its children will automatically use it. Theme resources can be alternatively loaded by writing them in a .theme file, see wiki for more info.

class.name: TileMap
class.description: Node for 2D Tile-Based games. Tilemaps use a TileSet which contain a list of tiles (textures, their rect and a collision) and are used to create complex grid-based maps. To optimize drawing and culling (sort of like [GridMap]), you can specify a quadrant size, so chunks of the map will be batched together at drawing time.

method.name: set_tileset
method.description: Set the current tileset.

method.name: get_tileset
method.description: Return the current tileset.

method.name: set_cell_size
method.description: Set the cell size.

method.name: get_cell_size
method.description: Return the cell size.

method.name: set_quadrant_size
method.description: Set the quadrant size, this optimizes drawing by batching chunks of map at draw/cull time.

method.name: get_quadrant_size
method.description: Return the quadrant size, this optimizes drawing by batching chunks of map at draw/cull time.

method.name: set_center_x
method.description: Set tiles to be centered in x coordinate. (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: get_center_x
method.description: Return true if tiles are to be centered in x coordinate (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: set_center_y
method.description: Set tiles to be centered in y coordinate. (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: get_center_y
method.description: Return true if tiles are to be centered in y coordinate (by default this is false and they are drawn from upper left cell corner).

method.name: set_cell
method.description: Set the contents of a cell. Cells can be optionally flipped in y or x.

method.name: get_cell
method.description: Return the contents of a cell.

method.name: is_cell_x_flipped
method.description: Return if a given cell is flipped in x axis.

method.name: is_cell_y_flipped
method.description: Return if a given cell is flipped in y axis.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear all cells.

constants.constant: Returned when a cell doesn't exist.

class.name: TileSet
class.description: A TileSet is a library of tiles for a [TileMap]. It contains a list of tiles, each consisting of a sprite and optional collision shapes.

method.name: create_tile
method.description: Create a new tile, the ID must be specified.

method.name: tile_set_name
method.description: Set the name of a tile, for decriptive purposes.

method.name: tile_get_name
method.description: Return the name of a tile, for decriptive purposes.

method.name: tile_set_texture
method.description: Set the texture of the tile.

method.name: tile_get_texture
method.description: Return the texture of the tile.

method.name: tile_set_region
method.description: Set the tile sub-region in the texture. This is common in texture atlases.

method.name: tile_get_region
method.description: Return the tile sub-region in the texture. This is common in texture atlases.

method.name: tile_set_shape
method.description: Set a shape for the tile, enabling physics to collide with it.

method.name: tile_get_shape
method.description: Return the shape of the tile.

method.name: remove_tile
method.description: Remove a tile, by integer id.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clear all tiles.

method.name: get_last_unused_tile_id
method.description: Find an empty id for creating a new tile.

method.name: find_tile_by_name
method.description: Find the first tile with the given name.

class.name: Timer
class.description: Timer node. This is a simple node that will emit a timeout callback when the timer runs out. It can optinally be set to loop.

method.name: set_wait_time
method.description: Set wait time. When the time is over, it will emit the timeout signal.

method.name: get_wait_time
method.description: Return the wait time. When the time is over, it will emit the timeout signal.

method.name: set_one_shot
method.description: Set as one-shot. If true, timer will stop after timeout, otherwise it will automatically restart.

method.name: is_one_shot
method.description: Return true if is set as one-shot. If true, timer will stop after timeout, otherwise it will automatically restart.

method.name: set_autostart
method.description: Set to automatically start when entering the scene.

method.name: has_autostart
method.description: Return true if set to automatically start when entering the scene.

method.name: start
method.description: Start the timer.

method.name: stop
method.description: Stop (cancel) the timer.

method.name: get_time_left
method.description: Return the time left for timeout if the timer is active.

signal.name: timeout
signal.description: Emitted when the time runs out.

class.name: Transform
class.description: Transform is used to store transformations, including translations. It consists of a Matrix3 "basis" and Vector3 "origin". Transform is used to represent transformations of any object in space. It is similar to a 4x3 matrix.

method.name: inverse
method.description: Returns the inverse of the transform.

method.name: xform
method.description: Transforms vector "v" by this transform.

method.name: xform_inv
method.description: Inverse-transforms vector "v" by this transform.

class.name: Translation
class.description: Translations are resources that can be loaded/unloaded on demand. They map a string to another string.

method.name: set_locale
method.description: Set the locale of the translation.

method.name: get_locale
method.description: Return the locale of the translation.

method.name: add_message
method.description: Add a message for translation.

method.name: get_message
method.description: Return a message for translation.

method.name: erase_message
method.description: Erase a message.

method.name: get_message_list
method.description: Return all the messages (keys).

class.name: TranslationServer
class.brief_description: Server that manages all translations. Translations can be set to it and removed from it.

class.name: VBoxContainer
class.description: Vertical box container. See [BoxContainer].

class.name: VButtonArray
class.description: Vertical button array. See [ButtonArray].

class.name: VScrollBar
class.brief_description: Vertical version of [ScrollBar], which goes from left (min) to right (max).

class.name: VSeparator
class.description: Vertical version of [Separator]. It is used to separate objects horizontally, though (but it looks vertical!).

class.name: VSlider
class.description: Vertical slider. See [Slider]. This one goes from left (min) to right (max).

class.name: VSplitContainer
class.description: Vertical split container. See [SplitContainer]. This goes from left to right.

method.name: distance_to
method.description: Returns the distance to vector "b".

method.name: dot
method.description: Returns the dot product with vector "b".

method.name: floor
method.description: Remove the fractional part of x and y.

method.name: length
method.description: Returns the length of the vector.

method.name: linear_interpolate
method.description: Returns the result of the linear interpolation between this vector and "b", by amount "i".

method.name: normalized
method.description: Returns a normalized vector to unit length.

class.name: Vector3
class.brief_description: Vector class, which performs basic 3D vector math operations.
class.description: Vector3 is one of the core classes of the engine, and includes several built-in helper functions to perform basic vecor math operations.

method.name: cross
method.description: Return the cross product with b.

method.name: cubic_interpolate
method.description: Perform a cubic interpolation between vectors a,b,c,d (b is current), by the given amount (i).

method.name: distance_squared_to
method.description: Return the squared distance (distance minus the last square root) to b.

method.name: distance_to
method.description: Return the distance to b.

method.name: dot
method.description: Return the dot product with b.

method.name: inverse
method.description: Returns the inverse of the vector. this is the same as Vector3( 1.0 / v.x, 1.0 / v.y, 1.0 / v.z )

method.name: length
method.description: Return the length of the vector.

method.name: length_squared
method.description: Return the length of the vector, squared.

method.name: linear_interpolate
method.description: Linearly interpolates the vector to a given one (b), by the given amount (i).

method.name: normalized
method.description: Return a copy of the normalized vector to unit length. This is the same as v / v.length()

method.name: snapped
method.description: Return a copy of the vector, snapped to the lowest neared multiple.

class.name: Viewport
class.brief_description: Creates a sub-view into the screen.
class.description: A Viewport creates a different view into the screen, or a sub-view inside another viewport. Children 2D Nodes will display on it, and children Camera 3D nodes will render on it too. Optionally, a viewport can have its own 2D or 3D world, so they don't share what they draw with other viewports. If a viewport is a child of a [Control], it will automatically take up its same rect and position, otherwise they must be set manually. Viewports can also choose to be audio listeners, so they generate positional audio depending on a 2D or 3D camera child of it. Also, viewports can be assigned to different screens in case the devices have multiple screens. Finally, viewports can also behave as render targets, in which case they will not be visible unless the associated texture is used to draw.

method.name: set_rect
method.description: Set the viewport rect. If the viewport is child of a control, it will use the same rect as the parent.

method.name: get_rect
method.description: Return the viewport rect. If the viewport is child of a control, it will use the same rect as the parent. Otherwise, if the rect is empty, the viewport will use all the allowed space.

method.name: get_visible_rect
method.description: Return the final, visuble rect in global screen coordinates.

method.name: set_transparent_background
method.description: If this viewport is a child of another viewport, keep the previously drawn background visible.

method.name: has_transparent_background
method.description: Reurn whether the viewport lets whatever is behind it to show.

method.name: get_viewport
method.description: Get the viewport RID from the visual server.

class.name: VisualServer
class.description: Server for anything visible. The visual server is the API backend for everything visible. The whole scene system mounts on it to display. The visual server is completely opaque, the internals are entirely implementation specific and cannot be accessed.

class.name: WindowDialog
class.description: Windowdialog is the base class for all window-based dialogs. It's a by-default toplevel [Control] that draws a window decoration and allows motion and resizing.

method.name: set_title
method.description: Set the title of the window.

method.name: get_title
method.description: Return the title of the window.

method.name: get_close_button
method.description: Return the close [TextureButton].

class.name: World
class.brief_description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world.
class.description: Class that has everything pertaining to a world. A physics space, a visual scenario and a sound space. Spatial nodes register their resources into the current world.

class.name: World2D
class.brief_description: Class that has everything pertaining to a 2D world.
class.description: Class that has everything pertaining to a 2D world. A physics space, a visual scenario and a sound space. 2D nodes register their resources into the current 2D world.

class.name: bool
class.description: Boolean built-in type.

class.name: int
class.description: Integer built-in type.
